activities: M&RR utilizes personal information to contact individuals to participate in market research surveys including, but not limited to, customer data such as name, address, phone number, email address, etc. provided by a client company.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: General Services - (GSV)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)Consumer Electronics - (CEL)General Consumer Goods - (GCG)
personaldata: off-line, on-line and manually processed data
privacyprograms: Members of ESOMAR - European Society for Opinion and Marketing Research; CASRO - Council of American Survey Organizations; MRA - Marketing Research Association; AMA - American Marketing Association; and BBB - Better Business Bureau
